short_summary: MODERNISATION DE LA CHAMBRE FORTE DESTINÉE À L'ENTREPÔT DES ARMES - ALDERSHOT
description: Extension of four (4) weapons vaults at Det. Aldershot, with four (4) weapons systems to be upgraded. To add functionality that will allow the custody of weapons to be recorded and allowed for a digital audit. Requirements include tactical cabinetry, lockers, cabinets, and precision shelving. Needs for Projects CM137 and 136-1A.FA contract value(Fine-Tune format):$256,627
